data.text: @VickerySec What evidence would then allow us to discern a lab-evolved weapon from a totally natural virus? Or a lab-evolved weapon developed by one country from one developed by another?
@DARosenthal No one claimed otherwise. You are being a little bit obtuse.
@VickerySec ancient batcaves are unbeatable reservoirs of filth
@DARosenthal (which can easily be recreated in an dark underground hangar with large pools of stagnant, mosquito-bearing, infested water in adjoining chambers)
@VickerySec do not underestimate the awesome power of a million bats hanging all day in a dark cave above a mountain of their own feces and feeding every night on a billion tiny bloodbag mosquitos

@DARosenthal Only over time.
When hundreds of millions of years are not available for cooking, a tuned lab environment is the way to get results.
@VickerySec That would certainly explain the interest in coffins by Ivanka.

@DARosenthal 1. Collect from bat.
2. Prod 'gain of function' under ideal lab conditioning.
3. Release in feasible locale.

It's magic. Seems impossible until explained.
